channel.title: Rune-Cheat 4.0 Final Project
channel.description:
[size=22pt][b]Rune-Cheat 4.0 Final Project [/b] [/size]
[b]Developers:[/b] T X Pur3 Mag3
[b]Features:[/b] Full range with projectiles Full Crafting interface (leather to blak dragon hide) Full feltching interface Cooking interface (pic: http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u116/the_owner2007/wewt.jpg) Woodcutting + Mining 95% done tree to stump to tree Fishing 87% done Farming (base of it on tree making atm) Runecrafting Smithing Dark Bow 4 Quests 2 Minigames 4 Different randoms
[b]Hoster:[/b] HW1 Processor: Single Processor Dual Core Opteron 180 - 2.40GHz HW2 RAM: 3 GB DDR 400 HW3 Disk Controller: Non-RAID HW4 First Hard Drive: 250GB SATA II HW9 Remote Management: Reboot / Remote Console NW1 Uplink Port Speed: 100 MBPS Public & Private Networks NW2 Public Bandwidth: 2000 GB Bandwidth NW4 Monitoring: Ping NW5 Emergency Response: Automated Notification NW6 Primary IP Address: 1 IP NW7 Secondary Addresses: 8 IP Addresses NW8 Lockbox: 1GB Lockbox SE1 AntiVirus: McAfee Anti-Virus SE2 Intrusion Detection & Protection: Network IDS/IPS Protection SE4 VPN Management - Private Network: Unlimited SSL VPN Users & 1 PPTP VPN User SE5 Vulnerability Assessments & Management: Nessus Vulnerability Ass Nessus Vulnerability Assessment & Reporting SE6 Server Security: Basic Server Hardening SE7 Private VLAN: Private VLAN SW1 Operating System (OS): CentOS 4 (32 bit) SW2 Database Software: MySQL 5.0 (Windows)
[b](who dosnt no that that means its like 150 ppl no lagg)[/b]
Hoping to come back with a big bang.
[b]Pictures:[/b] [img]http://img513.imageshack.us/img513/3456/8x187tmpwb7.jpg[/img] [img]http://img180.imageshack.us/img180/1256/qac88tmppv8.jpg[/img] [img]http://img339.imageshack.us/img339/6135/e6w89tmpks4.jpg[/img]

item.description:
@Pur3_Mag3 wrote:

[size=22pt]Rune-Cheat 4.0 Final Project [/size]

Developers:
T X
Pur3 Mag3

Features:
Full range with projectiles
Full Crafting interface (leather to blak dragon hide)
Full feltching interface
Cooking interface (pic: http://i166.photobucket.com/albums/u116/the_owner2007/wewt.jpg)
Woodcutting + Mining 95% done tree to stump to tree
Fishing 87% done
Farming (base of it on tree making atm)
Runecrafting
Smithing
Dark Bow
4 Quests
2 Minigames
4 Different randoms

Hoster:
HW1 Processor:
Single Processor Dual Core Opteron 180 - 2.40GHz
HW2 RAM:
3 GB DDR 400
HW3 Disk Controller:
Non-RAID
HW4 First Hard Drive:
250GB SATA II
HW9 Remote Management:
Reboot / Remote Console
NW1 Uplink Port Speed:
100 MBPS Public & Private Networks
NW2 Public Bandwidth:
2000 GB Bandwidth
NW4 Monitoring:
Ping
NW5 Emergency Response:
Automated Notification

1 IP
NW7 Secondary Addresses:

CentOS 4 (32 bit)

MySQL 5.0 (Windows)
